# NewSubmissionRequest

**Object**

Data that you provide when starting a submission to the notary service.

## Declaration

```swift
object NewSubmissionRequest
```

## Discussion

Use a structure of this type as the HTTP body when you post to the [doc://com.apple.notaryapi/documentation/NotaryAPI/Submit-Software] endpoint.

## Objects

- **NewSubmissionRequest.Notifications**: A notification that the notary service sends you when notarization finishes.

## Software submission

- **Submit Software**: Start the process of uploading a new version of your software to the notary service.
- **NewSubmissionResponse**: The notary service’s response to a software submission.
